PAGE1.TITLE: Let get started
PAGE1.DESCRIPTION: Enter the address that will be the driver's first stop. This can be your address or a friend's address, or any store's address.

PAGE2.TITLE: One more step
PAGE2.DESCRIPTION: Then enter the destination address. If you want the package to reach you, it means that you will have to enter your own address in this section.

PAGE3.TITLE: Tracking
PAGE3.DESCRIPTION: After confirming the fee, calculated depending on the distance, one of our available couriers will deliver the package to its destination. In this process, you will be able to see live where your package is.**

LOGIN.TITLE: Welcome Back
LOGIN.SUBTITLE: Hello there...
LOGIN.AGREE_TERMS_AND_POLICY: By signing in, you agree to our Terms & Privacy Policy
LOGIN.AUTO_FILL_EMAIL_SUBJECT: I'm having trouble signing in to Post Now App

SIGN_UP.TITLE: Welcome Back
SIGN_UP.SUBTITLE: Hello there, sign in to continue!
SIGN_UP.AGREE_TERMS_AND_POLICY: By signing up, you agree to our Terms & Privacy Policy

INVOICE.TITLE: Invoicing/billing address
INVOICE.ENABLE: I want my address to be written on the invoice/bill
INVOICE.DESCRIPTION: If you turn this on your adress of choice will be written on the invoice/bill.

SHOPPING_LIST_MAKER.TEXT_FIELD_HINT: Enter the name of the product you want.
SHOPPING_LIST_MAKER.TITLE: Shopping List
SHOPPING_LIST_MAKER.LEGAL: The first {amount} products have no extra cost, you will be charged {price} € for each prodcut after.

BACK.CONTENT: This list will be sent to your carrier, is that all you want?

MAPS.NO_AVAILABLE_DRIVER_MESSAGE: No available driver in your area.

ACCEPTED.MESSAGE: The carrier will take care of your order in shortly.

SEARCH_DRIVER.STATUS: Waiting for carrier to take your order.

VOUCHER.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You have now {value} € as credits to use.

ERROR.ALREADY_USED: This coupon has already been used.

JOB.PACKAGE_PICKED: The carrier picked up the package.

CAMERA.TITLE: Allow Post Now to take pictures.
CAMERA.MESSAGE: Post Now needs to acces your camera.

LOCATION.TITLE: Allow Post Now to access this device's location.
LOCATION.MESSAGE: To better function give the app permission to acces the device's location.

UPDATE_AVAILABLE.TITLE: New update available.
UPDATE_AVAILABLE.BODY: To use the app it must intsall the newest update.

ADDRESS_MANAGER.TITLE: Address details
ADDRESS_MANAGER.I_WILL_COME: I want the carrier to come to my door. (doesn't have to be 'my door')

ERROR_MESSAGES.HOUSE_NUMBER_IS_NEEDED: The house number must be entered.
ERROR_MESSAGES.DOOR_NUMBER_IS_NEEDED: If you want your package to be delivered to your door, please enter your door number.
ERROR_MESSAGES.DOOR_NAME_IS_NEEDED: Please enter the name of the person who will receive your package.

ARE_YOU_SURE_CANCEL.CONTENT_WITH_AMOUNT: You will be charged {amount} € for canceling your order.
ARE_YOU_SURE_CANCEL.CONTENT: Are you sure you want to cancel?

YOU_CANT_CHANGE.MESSAGE: If you have to chnage any of these informations please contact us.

ORDER_DETAILS.MESSAGE: Tell us shortly what you want from us.

NEED_TYP_ADDRESS.CONTENT: For orders taht cost more than {amount} € you have to order your adress for billing.
